verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace.<s%>
We <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> of you, <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> [of you] in our <S%G4335>prayers;<s%>

<S%G89>constantly<s%> <S%G3421>bearing<s%> in <S%G3421>mind<s%> your <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G5281>steadfastness<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> in our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in the <S%G1715>presence<s%> of our <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father,<s%>

for our <S%G2098>gospel<s%> did not <S%G1096>come<s%> to you in <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G1411>power<s%> and in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and with <S%G4183>full<s%> <S%G4136>conviction;<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as you <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3634>what<s%> <S%G3634>kind<s%> of <S%G3634>men<s%> we <S%G1096>proved<s%> to be <S%G1722>among<s%> you for your <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

You <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of us and of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> having <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> with the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>
<S%G5620>so<s%> that you <S%G1096>became<s%> an <S%G5179>example<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4100>believers<s%> in <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and in <S%G882>Achaia.<s%>

For the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1837>sounded<s%> <S%G1837>forth<s%> from you, not <S%G3440>only<s%> in <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> but also in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1831>gone<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> to <S%G2980>say<s%> <S%G5100>anything.<s%>

For they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G518>report<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> us <S%G3697>what<s%> <S%G3697>kind<s%> of a <S%G1529>reception<s%> we <S%G2192>had<s%> with you, and <S%G4459>how<s%> you <S%G1994>turned<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> from <S%G1497>idols<s%> to <S%G1398>serve<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> and <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

and to <S%G362>wait<s%> for His <S%G5207>Son<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> [that is] <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who <S%G4506>delivers<s%> us from the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G2064>come.<s%>
